thread.title: Abeiku Ainooson denies advising Joel Fameyeh to snub Hearts and Kotoko
thread.title_full: Abeiku Ainooson denies advising Joel Fameyeh to snub Hearts and Kotoko

title: Abeiku Ainooson denies advising Joel Fameyeh to snub Hearts and Kotoko
text:
Sports News | 20 October 2015 09:55 CET Abeiku Ainooson denies advising Joel Fameyeh to snub Hearts and Kotoko Abeiku Ainooson 
Enoch Fiifi Forson, Follow on Twitter @Efson_ 
Abeiku Ainoonson has denied reports suggesting he advised hot-talent Joel Fameyah to snub big clubs like Asante Kotoko and Hearts of Oak. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
